controller

Class DashboardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
      • controller.DashboardController

  • public class DashboardController
extends Controller
    This is the controller for the Dashboard Scene Where the current user can see what Album they have and delete/add/edit/open any of the album
    Author:
    Kevin Lee, Liam Davies
